bibl.title: Official Receipt for Kalandarika and Another Payment.
bibl.note: Receipt from an eques singularis addressed to a board of superior officers of the well-attested unit of "Moorish" cavalry stationed at Hermoupolis, V/VI A.D.

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. E.E.S. Inv. Misc. II 186(a) = P. Thomas 27
REA John R., Official Receipt for Kalandarika and Another Payment.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 229-234.
Receipt from an eques singularis addressed to a board of superior officers of the well-attested unit of "Moorish" cavalry stationed at Hermoupolis, V/VI A.D.
